description: The evaluation subsystem is orchestrated by the `Evaluation Core`, which provides the foundational framework for defining and executing evaluation pipelines. Users interact with this core functionality via the `Evaluation CLI`, enabling them to configure and trigger evaluations. During execution, the `Evaluation Core` utilizes `Monitoring Callbacks` to capture real-time event data. These `Monitoring Callbacks` then delegate the persistent storage of this data to `Monitoring Data Writers`, ensuring all evaluation metrics and events are accurately recorded. Conversely, the `Evaluation Core` also interacts directly with `Monitoring Data Writers` to retrieve or manage stored evaluation results, completing the feedback loop for analysis and reporting.

components.name: Monitoring Callbacks
components.description: Manages event-driven responses within the monitoring system, capturing real-time data from various system events and triggering subsequent actions.

components.name: Monitoring Data Writers
components.description: Responsible for the persistent storage of all monitoring data, ensuring accurate recording and storage for later analysis and reporting.

components.name: Evaluation Core
components.description: Provides the foundational framework for defining, configuring, and executing evaluation pipelines, assessing various metrics and performance indicators.

components.name: Evaluation CLI
components.description: Offers a command-line interface for users to interact with the evaluation subsystem, including defining new tasks and triggering pipelines.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
